title: A sight of ye trans-actions of these latter yeares emblemized with ingraven plats, which men may read without spectacles.
author: Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.
publisher: Are to be sould, by Thomas Ienner, in his shop at the old Exhange,
notes: Signed at the foot of page 21 [i.e. 29]: Collected by John Vicars.
A1r is blank. Title and imprint from engraving on A1v; place and date of publication from Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy, leaf A1r: "Decemb: 5th Lond: 1646".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
